name: Forced Leave
text: Give to the John Walker player. Flip to Alter-Ego form. Choose: • Exhaust John Walker and discard U.S. Agent's Shield → remove this obligation from the game. • Discard 1 card from your hand at random → discard this obligation.

flavor: "I am the defender of the American dream!"
name: Nuke
text: Forced Interrupt: When Nuke makes an attack against you, discard the top card from your deck. If an Aggression (red) card, or a card with a printed [physical] resource was discarded this way, that attack deals 1 additional damage.

flavor: The insidious Scourge is none other than Nuke, the cybernetically enhanced, pill-popping patriot!
name: Battle of the Patriots
text: Aggression (red), Basic (gray), and Leadership (blue) cards cost 1 additional resource. [acceleration]

name: Seeing Red
text: Discard the top 2 cards from your deck. If a card with a printed [physical] resource was discarded this way, take 2 indirect damage.

flavor: "This weapon is property of H.A.M.M.E.R. and Director of Security Osborn." —Nuke
name: Spear of Odin
text: Attach to the enemy with the most remaining hit points. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy deals damage to your hero, discard an upgrade you control, then discard Spear of Odin.
